imdb.plot outline: A lone hybrid canine is living in a city full of lies. A place he thought was his home has turned on him and his kind for generations. And it is time for it to stop. With the loss of his grandmother from a young age, being bullied by his classmates and verbally and mentally abused in his foster home, Chet has a severe case of depression and low self-esteem. He lets his "demon" get the best of him and constantly feels alone. Until he finds a special group that gives him hope for a better future.
imdb.title: Uprise
plot: A lone hybrid canine is living in a city full of lies. A place he thought was his home has turned on him and his kind for generations. And it is time for it to stop. With the loss of his grandmother from a young age, being bullied by his classmates and verbally and mentally abused in his foster home, Chet has a severe case of depression and low self-esteem. He lets his "demon" get the best of him and constantly feels alone. Until he finds a special group that gives him hope for a better future.
